wordGroup: theoretically speaking 理论上说，就理论而言

sentences.en: Theoretically, the price is supposed to be marked on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 从理论上说，价格是要标在货架上的。

sentences.en: Theoretically, such equipment could help paraplegics regain movement.
sentences.cn: 从理论上说，这样的器械可以帮助下身瘫痪者重新获得活动能力。

sentences.en: Theoretically, in the world of trade, shipping costs do not matter.
sentences.cn: 理论上，在贸易领域，运输成本并不重要。
